data.question: What is the empirical formula of PCN-700-(NO2)2?
What is the crystal system of compound 11?
What is the yield of benzaldehyde when using PCN-700-BPYDC(Cu)-TPDC-Me2 as a catalyst?
What is the space group of PCN-700-I2?
What is the effect of TPDC-R2 linker size on the selectivity of substrates in the catalytic system built in PCN-700?
data.answer: The size of substituents on the TPDC-R2 linker controls the selectivity of substrates by affecting the diffusion of substrate and the accessibility of the Cu+ center.

data.question: Is the crystallinity of PCN-700-BPYDC(Cu) well-maintained after three catalysis cycles?
Does the Cu:Zr ratio in PCN-700-BPYDC(Cu) change significantly after three cycles of reaction?
What is the role of TEMPO in the aerobic alcohol oxidation reaction catalyzed by PCN-700-BPYDC(Cu)?
data.answer: TEMPO is oxidized to TEMPOH while oxidizing the alcohol to aldehyde.

data.question: What is the maximum 2Θ range for data collection in the single crystal X-ray crystallography of PCN-700-BPYDC(Cu)-TPDC?
Is the yield of 9-Anthracenecarboxaldehyde less than 1% when using PCN-700-BPYDC(Cu)-TPDC-Hex2 as a catalyst?
What is the formula weight of compound 10?
Does increasing the size of substituents on the TPDC-R2 linker decrease the yields of alcohol conversion?
What is the effect of functional groups on the structure of MOFs synthesized with linkers L1 to L12?
data.answer: The resulting MOF structures are strongly dependent on the level of steric hindrance and the number of substituents on the linkers.

data.question: What is the volume of the unit cell for PCN-700-(NO2)4?
Is the yield of benzaldehyde 99% when using (bpy)Cu as a catalyst?
What is the role of N-methylimidazole in the catalytic cycle of aerobic alcohol oxidation by PCN-700-BPYDC(Cu)?
data.answer: N-methylimidazole coordinates with CuI species, facilitating its oxidation to CuII by O2 in ambient air.

data.question: What is the space group of compound 9?
Does the installation of TPDC-R2 linkers in PCN-700-BPYDC(Cu) result in a size-selective catalytic system for aerobic alcohol oxidation?
What is the yield of 1-Naphthaldehyde when using PCN-700-BPYDC(Cu) as a catalyst?
Is the yield of benzaldehyde higher when using PCN-700-BPYDC(Cu)-TPDC-Me2 compared to PCN-700-BPYDC(Cu)-TPDC-Hex2?
